mapper.select: select postIdx, postTitle, postContent, postMemberId, postCategory, postReadCnt, postCreatedAt, postUpdatedAt, postState from tbl_post where 1=1 and postState = 1 and postIdx = #{postIdx}

select tp.postIdx, tp.postTitle, tp.postContent, tp.postMemberId, tp.postCategory, tp.postReadCnt, tp.postCreatedAt, tp.postUpdatedAt, tp.postState , count(tpl.postLikeIdx) as postLikeCnt, max(case when tpl.postLikeMemberId = #{memberId} then 1 else 0 end) as isLike from tbl_post tp left outer join tbl_post_like tpl on tp.postIdx = tpl.postLikeRefIdx and tpl.postLikeRefType="POST" where 1=1 and tp.postState = 1 and tp.postIdx = #{postIdx} GROUP BY tpl.postLikeRefIdx ;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (postTitle, postContent, postMemberId, postCategory) VALUES (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postMemberId}, #{postCategory})
